full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NGES 'BYUNG LA BSTOD PA SNANG SHAS GCOD PA'I GSER GYI SPU GRI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(DE SKAD 'KHOR BA'I NYIS DMIGS KUN, ,MTSANG NAS 'BRU STI BYANG GROL GYI, ,PHAN YON STON NAS DON GNYER LA, ,THAR PA'I LAS MTSON TSIG BDAD 'DI,  ,LNGA LHAG BRGYAD BCU BGRANG BYA YIS, ,RAB MTHO RAB 'BYAMS GZHUNG LUGS KUN, ,SMRAS PA'I DAG LA DBANG BSGYUR BA'I, ,DRAN DBANG DGA' YI BKA'I BSKUL DON, ,MING BTAGS ZUNG GIS MING BZUNG LA, ,SGRO BTAGS BSTAN DAR MING CAN GYIS, ,DKAR 'JAM SNUM PA'I SHOG NGOS LA, ,SOR MO'I ZLOS GAR RAB TU BSGYUR,, ,,)
